name: Test: The Game
storyline: TEST: THE GAME follows a series of different characters that must defeat a demon called Paco to save the world. In order to accomplish their mission, they must explore an underworld that could only come out of a spanish high school cafeteria. One of the most important independent RPGs made in Spain.
summary: A project created by midosei, who states that it was going to be something small and short, but it ended taking up three years to make. The whole project is made with default assets from RPG Maker VX Ace.
